text: Member of the Government () is a 1939 Soviet drama movie directed by Iosif Kheifits and Aleksandr Zarkhi.Биография Иосифа ХейфицаЧлен правительства It stars Vera Maretskaya, Vasili Vanin, and Nikolay Kryuchkov. == Actors == * Vera Maretskaya as Aleksandra Grigoryevna Sokolova * Vasili Vanin as Yefim Yefimovich Sokolov * Nikolay Kryuchkov as Nikita Sokolov, blond brother-in-law * Ivan Nazarov as Fedot Petrovich Krivosheyev * Valentina Telegina as Panya, fat woman * Boris Blinov as The District Party Secretary == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1939 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Iosif Kheifits Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Zarkhi Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Member of the Government
